subject: Does anyone have a Junit test to test your EJB and conversation??
msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone had a complete Junit test to test your EJB that I could look at. I m new at Junit and just finished testing my Dao and wanted to see
messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone had a complete Junit test to test your EJB
that I could look at. I'm new at Junit and just finished testing my
Dao and wanted to see how other people test their Ejb. I have an Ejb
that has almost no business logic and essentially just gives you
connections.

Any help would be great!
Thanks!
